text:
@DemWrite @BrianKempGA @RonDeSantisFL @GregAbbott_TX @ASlavitt This happened in NY before they understood what was going on.  The NYC Fire Dept registered a 400% rise in cardiac arrests when Coronavirus first hit the city.  They figured it out & adjusted stats accordingly.
That was early March.  These states have no excuse.
